The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 December is 1,688,963 (3,000.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 December, there were 123,622 new confirmed cases (219.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 December, there were 88,352 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 40% (35,270 extra cases).
